External hire at £35k (C) vs. experienced or founder-managed at £30–32k (R/O). Based on East England gym manager averages (£33–36k). Founder operation reduces cost and improves DSCR. | v2 efficiencies: cost efficiency

£26k each (C) for qualified CWI instructors; £24k (R) typical regional rate; £22k (O) with mixed part-time or volunteer cover. Based on ABC Climbing Jobs & UK wall benchmarks. | v2 efficiencies: cost efficiency
25–35 hrs/week coverage; £20k (C) full rota, £18k (R) leaner, £16k (O) shared role or self-check-in system (e.g., Griptonite). Matches small-wall staffing levels. | v2 efficiencies: cost efficiency
Contracted daily 7 days (C £11k), reduced 5–6 days (R £10k), or part-time shared service (O £9k). Based on UK cleaning contractor rates £10–13/hr. | v2 efficiencies: cost efficiency
20 % uplift (C/R) covers NI 13.8 %, pension 3 %, holiday/training. 17 % (O) if mostly PT or owner-operated. Based on HMRC employer cost guidance. | v2 efficiencies: cost efficiency
Year 1: 3–4 resets instead of 6, minimal spare holds; use freelance setters at ~£300/day. | v2 efficiencies: cost efficiency
Year 1: single LOLER + basic inspections; less equipment volume. | v2 efficiencies: cost efficiency

Mandatory from Day 1 but fixed low cost. | v2 efficiencies: cost efficiency

Basic one-off legal review of lease, insurance and H&S templates; postpone ongoing retainers until Year 2. | v2 efficiencies: cost efficiency
